summary: Build a modern premium SaaS startup landing page website for “IDEAZS” with a minimal futuristic dark-gradient design, glassmorphism cards, and smooth scroll/hover animations.
architectural_notes: Landing page aesthetic: dark gradient (deep navy to black), bold typography with strong hierarchy, lots of whitespace, rounded corners, soft shadows, glassmorphism cards.
UI motion: smooth fade-in on scroll and subtle hover glow; optional animated gradient background or floating light particles.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page marketing landing page for “IDEAZS” with the following sections in order: Hero, Problem Statement, How It Works, Features, Pricing, Final CTA.

Implement the overall visual theme: minimal, futuristic, premium SaaS look with a dark gradient background (deep navy to black), strong typographic hierarchy, ample whitespace, rounded corners, soft shadows, and glassmorphism cards; use an electric blue or violet glow accent consistently for interactive elements and highlights.

Build the Hero section with: headline “Launch Your Idea. Sell in Minutes.”; subheadline “IDEAZS turns your product idea into a stunning, ready-to-share launch page — instantly.”; primary CTA button “Start Your Launch”; secondary button “See How It Works”. Include a subtle animated gradient background or floating light particle effect behind/around the hero for a premium feel.
Add the Problem Statement section with title “Ideas Don’t Fail. Launches Do.” and short marketing copy describing how people struggle to launch products due to time, design, and technical barriers.
Add a “How It Works” section laid out as 3 columns on desktop (stacked on mobile) with icons and the following steps: “Describe Your Product”, “Choose Your Style”, “Launch Instantly”.
Add a Features section using modern feature cards with icons for: “Auto-generated product page”, “Mobile optimized design”, “Built-in conversion layout”, “Shareable launch link”, “Analytics (Pro)”.

Add a Pricing section with 3 clean tier cards: Free, Pro, Elite. Visually highlight the Pro plan with a subtle glow border and/or elevated emphasis while staying consistent with the minimal premium theme.
Add a Final CTA section with big bold text “Your Idea Deserves to Be Seen.” and a CTA button labeled “Launch with IDEAZS Now”.
Implement smooth fade-in scroll animations for major sections and subtle hover glow effects for interactive elements (buttons, cards, links) while keeping transitions smooth and high-end.

Wire the Hero CTAs to sensible on-page navigation: “See How It Works” scrolls to the How It Works section; “Start Your Launch” and “Launch with IDEAZS Now” scroll to Pricing or the final CTA area (choose one consistent target and implement smooth scrolling).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create the IDEAZS high-converting SaaS landing page with hero, problem statement, how-it-works, features, pricing tiers, and final CTA sections using dark gradient + electric blue/violet accent styling and subtle animations.
